TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant sued the local social welfare authority ( PERSON по социальной защите населения администрации Советского района г. GPE ) claiming readjustment of her old - age pension . On DATE the ORG of GPE granted her claim and awarded her MONEY . No appeal was brought against the judgment , and it became final and enforceable DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff initiated enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff terminated the proceedings because the defendant had not had sufficient funds to pay the judgment debt .
CARDINAL . On DATE the monies due to the applicant were transferred into her bank account .
